Requires 4 city tiles ON MARS. Increase: Requires 4 city tiles ON MARS. Increase your M€ production 3 steps. Place a city tile on top of an already placed ocean tile, FOLLOWING NORMAL CITY PLACEMENT RESTRICTIONS. The tile counts as a city and an ocean.
Oxygen must be 7% or less. Gain 1 plant: Oxygen must be 7% or less. Gain 1 plant per power tag you have.
Requires that you have a city. Decrease: Requires that you have a city. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 4 steps.
Effect: Each time a city is placed, gain: Effect: Each time a city is placed, gain a disease here.
Action: Remove a disease from ANY OF YOU: Action: Remove a disease from ANY OF YOUR CARDS to gain 1 M€ per city in play.
Requires two cities in play. Increase yo: Requires two cities in play. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.
Requires that you have 3 cities. Gain 2: Requires that you have 3 cities. Gain 2 plants.
Spend 1 microbe from ANY of your cards t: Spend 1 microbe from ANY of your cards to gain 5 plants
Action: Spend 10 M€ (titanium may be use: Action: Spend 10 M€ (titanium may be used) to add 2 asteroids here.
Action: Spend 1 asteroid here to place a: Action: Spend 1 asteroid here to place an ocean tile. FIRST PLAYER CHOOSES WHERE YOU MUST PLACE IT.
Action: Gain 3 M€ per completed terrafor: Action: Gain 3 M€ per completed terraforming parameter.
Effect: When playing a building tag, pla: Effect: When playing a building tag, plants may be used as 3 M€ each.
Requires that you have 2 greenery tiles. Increase plant production 1 step.
Effect: When you play an Earth tag, you: Effect: When you play an Earth tag, you pay 2 M€ less.
Effect: When any player plays a space ev: Effect: When any player plays a space event, draw a card.
Action: Spend 1 energy production to gai: Action: Spend 1 energy production to gain 1 plant production.
Action: Gain 1 M€ for each CITY AND SPEC: Action: Gain 1 M€ for each CITY AND SPECIAL TILE adjacent to an ocean.
Effect: When any ocean is placed, you MA: Effect: When any ocean is placed, you MAY pay 5 M€ (steel may be used), to raise energy production 1 step and add 1 hydroelectric resource to this card.
1 VP per hydroelectric resource on this: 1 VP per hydroelectric resource on this card
Action: MOVE THE NOMADS to an adjacent,: Action: MOVE THE NOMADS to an adjacent, non-reserved empty area and collect THE PLACEMENT BONUS as if placing a special tile there. No tiles may be placed on the Nomad area.
PLACE THE NOMADS on a non-reserved, empt: PLACE THE NOMADS on a non-reserved, empty area on the game board.
Increase M€ production 2 steps. Draw 1 c: Increase M€ production 2 steps. Draw 1 card. Remove 1 of your greenery tiles (does not affect oxygen.) Place a city tile there, regardless of placement rules. Gain placement bonuses as usual.
Effect: When you raise the temperature,: Effect: When you raise the temperature, gain 3 M€.
Augmentez votre production de chaleur de 2.
Oxygen must be 4% or lower. Increase you: Oxygen must be 4% or lower. Increase your M€ production 2 steps. Gain 1 M€ per empty area adjacent to your tiles.
Action: Pay 5 M€ (STEEL MAY BE USED) to: Action: Pay 5 M€ (STEEL MAY BE USED) to build 1 Cathedral in a city. Max 1 per city. City owner can pay 2 M€ to draw 1 card.
1 VP per City with a Cathedral in it.
Increase your steel production 1 step. C: Increase your steel production 1 step. Copy the PRODUCTION BOXES of 2 of your cards with building tags.
Effect: When you play a science tag, inc: Effect: When you play a science tag, including this, add a graphene resource here.
Effect: When playing a space or city tag: Effect: When playing a space or city tag, graphenes may be used as 4 M€ each.
RETURN UP TO 2 OF YOUR PLAYED EVENT CARD: RETURN UP TO 2 OF YOUR PLAYED EVENT CARDS TO YOUR HAND. THEY MAY NOT BE CARDS THAT PLACE SPECIAL TILES.
Requires you have a city next to an ocea: Requires you have a city next to an ocean. Draw 3 cards with a building tag.
Action: Spend 3 heat to gain either 4 M€: Action: Spend 3 heat to gain either 4 M€ or 2 plants.
EFFECT: CONVERTING ENERGY TO HEAT DURING: EFFECT: CONVERTING ENERGY TO HEAT DURING PRODUCTION IS OPTIONAL FOR EACH ENERGY RESOURCE.
Requires 4% oxygen. Increase your plant: Requires 4% oxygen. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 1 plant for every plant tag you have.
Increase titanium production 2 steps. Ga: Increase titanium production 2 steps. Gain 3 titanium.
Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 astero: Action: Dépensez 1 titane pour ajouter 1 ressource astéroïde sur N'IMPORTE QUELLE CARTE.
Action: Remove 1 asteroid here to place: Action: Retirez un 1 astéroïde de cette carte pour placer un Océan.
Effect: When playing a card with a requi: Effet: Lorsque vous jouez une carte avec un prérequis, vous pouvez payer 2 M€ de moins pour la jouer.
Requires that a player removed ANOTHER P: Nécessite qu'un joueur ait enlevé les plantes d'UN AUTRE JOUEUR à cette génération. Gagnez 1 titane ou 2 acier.
Action: Spend 6 M€ to add 1 asteroid to: Action: Spend 6 M€ to add 1 asteroid to ANY CARD (titanium may be used to pay for this).
Action: Remove 1 asteroid here to raise: Action: Remove 1 asteroid here to raise temperature 1 step.
Increase your M€ production 2 steps, inc: Increase your M€ production 2 steps, increase your energy production 1 step, gain 3 plants, and place a city tile.
Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your en: Nécessite 4 tuiles Océan. Augmentez votre production d'énergie de 2.
Requires 3 power tags. Raise your TR 4 s: Requires 3 power tags. Raise your TR 4 steps.
Action : Dépensez 5 chaleurs pour gagner 3 aciers.
Action: Add a microbe or animal to ANOTH: Action : Ajoutez un microbe ou un animal à UNE AUTRE carte.
Gain 3 plants. Raise temperature 1 step,: Gain 3 plants. Raise temperature 1 step, and place 1 ocean tile.
Requires that you have 9 different types: Requires that you have 9 different types of resources. Gain 1 TR.
Effect: When you gain a microbe to ANY C: Effect: When you gain a microbe to ANY CARD, also gain 1 M€.
Gain 4 plants and add 4 microbes to ANOT: Gain 4 plants and add 4 microbes to ANOTHER CARD.
Action: REVEAL AND DISCARD the top card: Action: REVEAL AND DISCARD the top card of the deck. If it has a space tag, add an asteroid here.
opponents may not remove your plants: Les adversaires ne peuvent plus vous retirer de plantes.
Decrease your energy production 1 step. 1VP per asteroid on this card.
Lose 2 plants. Increase your M€ producti: Perdez 2 plates. Augmentez votre production de M€ de 2.
Effect: When you gain an animal to ANY C: Effet : Lorsque vous gagnez un Animal sur N'IMPORTE QUELLE CARTE, gagnez 2 M€.
Decrease your energy production 4 steps: Diminuez votre production d'énergie de 4, augmentez votre production de plantes de 2. Augmentez votre NT de 3 et placez cette tuile.
Action: Gain 1 M€ per science tag you ha: Action: Gagnez 1 M€ par badge Science en votre possession.
Diminuez votre production de M€ de 2.
Steal 3 M€ from a player that REMOVED YO: Volez 3 M€ à un joueur qui a RETIRE VOS RESSOURCES OU DIMINUE VOTRE PRODUCTION lors de cette génération. Placez cette carte face cachée dans la pile des EVENEMENTS DE CE JOUEUR.
Increase temperature 1 step. Remove up t: Augmentez la température de 1. Enlevez jusqu'à 2 plantes à n'importe quel joueur.
Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 astero: Action: Dépensez 1 titane pour ajouter 1 ressource astéroïde sur cette carte et augmenter votre production de M€ de 1.
1 PV tous les 2 astéroïdes sur cette carte.
Effect: When you play a card with a basi: Effet: Lorsque vous jouez une carte ayant un coût de 20 M€ ou plus, augmentez votre production de M€ de 1.
Use a card action that has been used thi: Utilisez l'action d'une carte qui a déjà été utilisée cette génération.
Effect: Your steel resources are worth 1: Effet: Vos ressources d'acier valent 1 M€ supplémentaire.
Increase your M€ production 1 step per d: Augmentez votre production de M€ de 1 pour chaque badge différent que vous avez en jeu.
Action : Ajoutez 1 animal sur cette carte.
Requires 2 oceans. Increase your plant p: Nécessite 2 Océans. Augmentez votre production de plantes et de chaleur de 1 chacune.
Action: Reveal and place a SPACE OR BUIL: Action: Révélez et placez ici une carte ayant un badge Construction ou Espace depuis votre main et placez 2 ressources dessus ou doublez le nombre de ressources sur cette carte.
Effect: Card here may be played as if fr: Effect: Card here may be played as if from hand with its cost reduced by the number of resources on it.
Requires 2 science tags. Decrease your e: Nécessite 2 badges Science. Diminuez votre production d'énergie de 1 et augmentez votre production de titane de 1. Gagnez 4 titanes.
Action: Spend any amount of energy to dr: Action: Dépensez n'importe quelle quantité d'énergiepour piocher un même nombre de cartes. GARDEZ 1 DE CES CARTES EN MAIN ET DEFAUSSEZ LES AUTRES.
Decrease your energy production 4 steps: Decrease your energy production 4 steps and increase your plant production 2 steps. Raise your TR 3 steps. Place this tile.
Effect: Your titanium resources are wort: Effect: Your titanium resources are worth 1 M€ extra.
Action: Dépensez 2 X M€ pour gagner X énergie.
Action: Decrease energy production 1 ste: Action: Diminuez votre production d'énergie de 1 pour gagnez 8 M€.
Action: Spend 1 M€ to add 1 asteroid to: Action: Dépensez 1 M€ pour ajouter 1 astéroïde sur N'IMPORTE QUELLE carte.
Action: Spend 1 asteroid here to increas: Action: Dépensez 1 astéroïde pour augmenter votre production de M€ de 1 ou gagner 2 titanes.
Place a city tile IN SPACE, outside and: Placez une tuile Cité DANS L'ESPACE, en dehors et détachée de la planète.
Raise temperature 3 steps and gain 4 ste: Raise temperature 3 steps and gain 4 steel. Place this tile ADJACENT TO no city tile. Remove up to 6 plants from any player.
Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your en: Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 2 steps. Place this tile ADJACENT TO an ocean tile.
Decrease your energy production 4 steps: Diminuez votre production d'énergie de 4 et augmentez votre production de plantes de 2. Augmentez votre NT de 3.
Requires 8 oceans. 1 VP for each animal: Requires 8 oceans. 1 VP for each animal on this card.
Action: Spend 2X M€ to gain X energy, or: Action: Spend 2X M€ to gain X energy, or decrease energy production 1 step to gain 8 M€.
Draw 1 card. Choose 1 of your played car: Draw 1 card. Choose 1 of your played cards and add 1 microbe to it for each science tag you have, including this.
Action: Spend 2 energy to gain 2 plants: Action: Spend 2 energy to gain 2 plants OR to add 1 animal to ANOTHER card.
Requires that you have 3 greenery tiles: Requires that you have 3 greenery tiles in play. Gain 12 M€.
Requires any city adjacent to an ocean. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.
